text: Aleksandra Urban (born March 17, 1978) is a Polish painter. Diploma in painting at the Faculty of Painting and Sculpture at the Academy of Fine Arts in Wrocław. Scholarships of the Ministry of Culture and National Heritage in 1998 and 2003. ==External links== *Biography *Aleksandra Urban at culture.pl Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Polish painters Category:21st-century Polish painters Category:Polish women painters Category:People from Jelenia Góra
title: Aleksandra Urban
